metadata.title: CVE-2014-9218 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: libraries/common.inc.php in phpMyAdmin 4.0.x before 4.0.10.7, 4.1.x before4.1.14.8, and 4.2.x before 4.2.13.1 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (resource consumption) via a long password.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
